name: Teddy Bear Story - A Fabian Velander Creation
name_original: Teddy Bear Story - A Fabian Velander Creation
description:
Coping with loss can be hard.

Your daughter died in a car crash.

There was nothing you could do to save her, and you know that.

The car crash wasn't your fault, and you know that.

Looking for a teddy bear should not be a priority when your child is bleeding out on the ground, and you know that.

But you still can't forgive yourself for ignoring her last wish. Luckily, new experimental hypnosis drugs may be able to help you through your grief. Made for VimJam: Collectables (8 Bits to Infinity)
